title: A Rainbow of Food
description: A Rainbow of Food teaches students that eating healthy foods can be fun-and colorful. Readers also learn how different colored fruits and vegetables benefit their bodies. Detailed, supportive photographs, and high-frequency words support beginning readers.
meta: cob, energy, healthy, snack, stomach, vitamins
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Manipulate Medial Sounds : Manipulate medial sounds
Prepositions : Recognize and use prepositions for and with
Compound Words : Understand and use compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
